common.media_upload_hint: Add your media here, we only support .jpg, .png and .svg and zip files.
common.thank_you_your_request_has_been_received: Thank you! Your request has been received. Our team will contact you soon to arrange the technician visit
common.submission_successful_description: Thank you for providing the details! Your information has been received and will be reviewed shortly. We’ll get back to you if any additional details are needed.
common.submission_successful_description_phase_: Thank you for providing the details! Your information has been received. To proceed, you need to complete the follow-up questions in Phase 2 before the report can be generated. Please note that you cannot go back or cancel at this stage.

qna.get_started_description: Answer a few questions to help us understand your equipment better. This will ensure the best recommendations for your needs. Click the button below to begin.
qna.need_help: Need help filling out the Q&A?
qna.check_guideline: Check out this guideline to ensure everything is filled out correctly before you start.
qna.select_equipment_type_description: Choose the type of equipment you want to provide details for. Select between Air Conditioning and Refrigeration to proceed with the relevant form.
qna.select_the_type_of_equipment_you_want_to: Select the type of equipment you want to proceed with
qna.pick_your_preferred_language_to_continue: Pick your preferred language to continue
qna.choose_an_option_below_to_proceed_with_y: Choose an option below to proceed with your Air Conditioning request.
qna.need_help_hit_the_panic_button: Need Help? Hit the Panic Button
qna.fill_in_the_necessary_details_about_your: Fill in the necessary details about your air conditioning system
qna.add_any_extra_information_or_context_her: Add any extra information or context here...
qna.are_you_sure_you_want_to_book_a_technici: Are you sure you want to book a technician?
qna.please_confirm_that_the_appointment_deta: Please confirm that the appointment details you've entered are correct. Once submitted, a technician will be assigned based on your selected schedule.
qna.if_you_have_a_list_of_air_conditioning_a: If you have a list of Air Conditioning assets available, you can upload it here. This helps us process your request more efficiently. You may skip this step if you don’t have the document.
qna.add_your_media_here_we_only_support_jpg_: Add your media here, we only support .jpg, .png and .svg and zip files.
qna.add_your_media_here_we_only_support_pdf_: Add your media here, we only support .pdf and excel files.
qna.upload_your_ac_asset_list_for_faster_pro: Upload your AC asset list for faster processing.
qna.fill_out_the_form_based_on_your_air_cond: Fill out the form based on your air conditioner
qna.technician_will_visit_to_assess_your_ac_: Technician will visit to assess your AC needs.
qna.upload_a_picture_of_nameplate_of_the_uni: Upload a picture of nameplate of the unit (indoor & outdoor unit)
qna.add_your_media_here_we_only_support_jpg_: Add your media here, we only support .jpg and .png files.
qna.what_is_the_brand_of_the_equipment: What is the brand of the equipment?
qna.what_is_the_model_of_the_equipment: What is the model of the equipment? (Indoor and Outdoor)
qna.what_is_the_serial_number_of_the_equipme: What is the serial number of the equipment?
qna.what_is_the_type_of_air_conditioning_sys: What is the type of Air Conditioning? (Indoor and Outdoor)
qna.air_conditioner_operating_hours_per_day: Air Conditioner operating hours per day
qna.number_of_days_per_week_is_the_ac_runnin: Number of days per week is the AC running
qna.ratio_of_outside_units_to_inside_units: Ratio of outside units to inside units
qna.enter_number_of_days_per_week: Enter number of days per week
qna.how_often_do_you_maintain_your_equipment: How often do you maintain your equipment?
qna.on_coil_air_temperature_c: On coil air temp °C (return air temp)
qna.off_coil_air_temperature_c: Off coil air temp °C (cold air temp)
qna.is_there_wifi_available_at_the_electrica: Is there wifi available at the electrical room area?
qna.enter_on_coil_air_temp_c: Enter on coil air temp °C (return air temp)
qna.enter_off_coil_air_temp_c: Enter off coil air temp °C (cold air temp)
qna.system_ability_to_cycle_on_off_based_on_: System Ability to Cycle 'On/Off' Based on Temp Set Points
qna.enter_the_frequency_of_system_maintenanc: Enter the frequency of system maintenance or servicing.
qna.manage_refrigeration_units_for_each_kitc: Manage refrigeration units for each kitchen set.
qna.fill_in_the_necessary_details_about_your: Fill in the necessary details about your refrigeration system
qna.please_check_all_the_details_you_have_en: Please check all the details you have entered before submitting.
qna.if_you_have_another_air_conditioner_with: If you have another air conditioner with a different brand, model, or type, please click the button below
qna.this_may_take_a_few_minutes: This may take a few minutes

report.currently_infrastructure_is_performing_w: Currently infrastructure is performing well with no critical issues detected
report.label: Label
report.to_ensue_optimal_performance_and_energy_: To ensure optimal performance and energy savings from the Coolnomix system, regular maintenance is essential; we offer this service at a discounted rate, but if you choose to handle it yourself and fail to maintain the required upkeep, our monthly fee will remain based on the average efficiency achieved in previous months until proper maintenance is performed.

validation.max_operating_hours_per_day: Minimum operating hours per day is 1 and maximum is 24
validation.max_running_days_per_week: Minimum running days per week is 1 and maximum is 7
validation.please_enter_a_valid_email_address: Please enter a valid email address
validation.phone_number_must_be_at_least_8_digits: Phone number must be at least 8 digits
validation.phone_number_must_contain_only_digits: Phone number must contain only digits
validation.npwp_must_be_at_least_16_digits: NPWP must be at least 16 digits
validation.password_must_be_at_least_8_characters: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.password_must_contain_at_least_one_upper: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
validation.password_must_contain_at_least_one_lower: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
validation.password_must_contain_at_least_one_numbe: Password must contain at least one number
validation.password_must_contain_at_least_one_speci: Password must contain at least one special character
